item.title: Maintainable Terraform CIDR lists
item.description: Problem Your Terraform config requires managing many CIDRs that control firewall ingress rules. You’ve been storing these in a CSV string: variable "client_cidrs" { default="50.1.1.1/32,44.2.1.0/32", } which is fed to a aws_security_group somewhere in your configuration. The CIDRs change frequently and maintaining this variable is difficult as it’s hard to track where each individual CIDR came from. Solution Use a HCL list variable which allows each entry to have an associated comment explaining what the CIDR corresponds to:
